explains: adj. 令人沮丧的，令人忧愁的；造成萧条的
v. （使）沮丧；（使经济）萧条；降低（价值或工资）（depress 的现在分词）

sentences.en: I found the whole business very depressing.
sentences.cn: 我觉得整件事令人沮丧。

sentences.en: Looking for a job these days can be very depressing.
sentences.cn: 如今求职有时会令人非常沮丧。

sentences.en: Yesterday's unemployment figures were as depressing as those of the previous 22 months.
sentences.cn: 昨天的失业数字和前22个月的一样令人沮丧。
